prod_short_desc: Head off on your holidays with the LEGO® DUPLO® Airport!
prod_long_desc:
Get ready for take-off at the LEGO® DUPLO® Airport! Build the luggage check-in and make sure your suitcases are taken to the plane. Drive the refueling truck over to fill up the plane. Then help the pilot take his seat and make sure all the passengers are on board ready to fly away. This set will keep any little pilot entertained as they master early building skills and enjoy playing with the two iconic airport vehicles. Use this set to talk to your child about what happens at the airport beforetheir first trip on a plane! DUPLO bricks are brightly colored and designed especially to be safe for smaller hands. Includes three DUPLO figures: a passenger, pilot and an airport worker.
Includes 3 LEGO® DUPLO® figures: a passenger, pilot and an airport worker
Features a buildable plane, buildable refueling vehicle and a luggage check-in desk
Accessories include 2 suitcases, gas pump, wrench, luggage basket and travel decorated brick
Includes extra bricks to extend the building possibilities
Fill the plane up ready for a long flight
Check your luggage in at the desk
Board the plane and fly away!
Create all kinds of role play fun at the Airport with this exciting new set
Help young children master basic building skills
Play out airport routines and air travel before your own holiday adventures
DUPLO products are specially designed to be fun and safe for younger hands
Luggage check-in measures over 6" high, 2" wide and 2" long
Plane measures over 3" high, 7" long and 7" wide
Refueling vehicle measures over 5" high, 3" long and 1" wide
Makes an ideal addition toany DUPLO Town collection
